main event: An observer reported seeing an unidentified object larger than the sun in Fairborn, Ohio on August 7, 1966.
interesting points: The object was noted to be larger than the sun and located above the clouds., The observer was looking southward towards the object, indicating it was high in the sky., The object appeared solid white rather than glowing., The observer reported that the object made no sound at all., The observer stated that the object had a duration of observation that was uncertain.
sighted object: unidentified object larger than the sun
witness description: A resident of Fairborn, Ohio who reported an unusual sighting.
